content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment. Can I get your name, please?
Hi, uh, my name is Margaret. I need someone for an electrical issue.
Thank you, Margaret! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Yes, it's 42 Maple Lane, Brighton, outside the city. I hope that's alright?
Thanks for providing your address! One moment while I check if you're within our service area.

I'm sorry, Margaret, but it looks like your address at 42 Maple Lane, Brighton is outside our service area. Unfortunately, we won't be able to book an appointment at that location. If you have any other address within the city, please let me know!
